item.title: Beomaster 8000 - Workbench Unit - Testing a replacement device for the AD 10/278 Multiplex Switch on the preamplifier board
item.description:
My initial project using my new, dedicated Beomaster 8000 workshop unit is testing a replacement device I designed. This device replaces the Beomaster 8000 preamplifier board’s input source switching ICs, IC102 and IC202, which are obsolete AD 10/278 multiplexer devices. The Beomaster 8000 preamplifier uses two types of analog switches for source selection. 3IC102 and 3IC202, the AD 10/278 devices, choose between FM, Phono, and Tape 2 for both left and right channels...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/-beomaster-8000-workbench-unit-testing-a-replacement-device-for-the-ad-10278-multiplex-switch-on-the-preamplifier-board/
